ComicInfo.Summary:
The Wolf Dancer!: Down on his luck the dancer Lou witnesses the Navaho wolf dance and steals the Indian head-dress. He is cursed to assume the features of a wolf. Turning into a wild animal, Lou is shot dead by the police.
The Sealed Coffin: Myra and Jeff, Hollywood movie stars, travel through Africa and accidentally kill a child. When they try to just buy their way out of this tragedy, a native death cult takes revenge. Myra gets cursed with disfigurement and Jeff is trapped alive in her tomb.
The Songs of St. Saens: The French composer has a premonition about a friend's death.
Fright Cry: A young boy's governess turns out to be a witch trying to murder the child.
A Father's Phantom: A man experiences encounter with the ghost of his deceased father.
Revenge at Glamis Castle: The earl of Glamis goes mad after stabbing a fellow gambler to death.
Interlude for Death: Old Jethro Sykes makes a deal with Death. He lives on, but the charitable man turns into an evil person.
Two Deaths to Die!: Executed gangster is brought back to life - and killed again by a rival.
ComicInfo.Title: The Wolf Dancer!; The Sealed Coffin; The Songs of St. Saens; Fright Cry; A Father's Phantom; Revenge at Glamis Castle; Interlude for Death; Two Deaths to Die!
ComicInfo.Penciller: Artie Saaf,John Celardo,Mike Sekowsky,Rocco Mastroserio,Jack Katz,Artie Saaf,John Celardo,Mike Sekowsky,Rocco Mastroserio,Jack Katz
ComicInfo.Inker: Artie Saaf,John Celardo,Mike Peppe,Rocco Mastroserio,Jack Katz,Artie Saaf,John Celardo,Mike Peppe,Rocco Mastroserio,Jack Katz
